official_title: Joint resolution authorizing the President to proclaim the week beginning May 1, 1977, and ending May 7, 1977, as National Electronics Week.

summary.text: Authorizes and requests the President to designate the week beginning May 1, 1977, and ending May 7, 1977, as "National Electronics Week."

titles.title: Joint resolution authorizing the President to proclaim the week beginning May 1, 1977, and ending May 7, 1977, as National Electronics Week.
